title: Washita Battlefield National Historic Site: Permits & Reservations
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Permits & Reservations              Permits & Reservations       Permits If you are planning a special event please contact the park for more information. You may need a special use permit for certain types of activities which might impact the commemorative significance of the site or other park visitors. Please choose from the permits below: Special Use Permit Commercial Filming-Still Photography Permit Reservations We recommend making a reservation if you want to see the park's film, and/or presentation or guided tour from one of our park rangers. Otherwise, the 11/2 mile walking tour is self-guiding. Trail Guide booklets may be obtained at the trailhead, or the visitor center. Walk-in requests for film presentations or ranger led programs are welcome and encouraged at no charge. School group or tour group presentations are recommended to be made in advance.
